com.bobman159.rundml.core.util

Class CoreUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bobman159.rundml.core.util.CoreUtils

  • public class CoreUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for use in building the SQL statements for RunDML.

      • getClassField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field getClassField(java.lang.Class<?> tableRowClass,
                                                    java.lang.String fieldName)
        Returns the java.lang.reflect.Field object for the field name being searched for in a table row class.
        Parameters:
        tableRowClass - table row class name
        fieldName - field name to find in the table row class
        Returns:
        the Field entry for the field name, null if no matching field found
        See Also:
        Class.getField(String)

      • isAnIFieldMap

        public static boolean isAnIFieldMap(java.lang.Class<?> tableRowClass)
        Test if a specified class implements the IFieldMap interface
        Parameters:
        tableRowClass - the class to test if it implements the interface
        Returns:
        true if the class implements IFieldMap, false if it does not

      • createColumnsFromClass

        public static ISQLType[] createColumnsFromClass(java.lang.Class<?> tableRowClass)
                                         throws RunDMLException
        Creates a list of ISQLType column entries for a specified table row class. A table row class field name is used as the column name by default, unless an entry is added to the Field Map in which case the column name is from that entry is used.
        Parameters:
        tableRowClass - the table row class
        Returns:
        an array of column names as an ISQLType[] array
        Throws:
        RunDMLException - when errors occur building the field map

      • formatMessage

        public static java.lang.String formatMessage(java.lang.String formatMsg,
                                             java.lang.Object... args)
        Formats message text for display using a variable number of arguments
        Parameters:
        formatMsg - the message text to be displayed
        args - variable length argument list for the message
        Returns:
        a formatted string for display

      • createColumnsFromStrings

        public static ISQLType[] createColumnsFromStrings(java.lang.String[] columns)
        Create an array of ISQLType[] table column names from a String array. No case sensitivity is expected for the list of column names
        Parameters:
        columns - a string of array table column names
        Returns:
        an array of ISQLType column names

      • normalizeString

        public static java.lang.String normalizeString(java.lang.String sqlClause)
        Normalizes or removes leading, trailing and extra spaces " " from an SQL clause
        Parameters:
        sqlClause - a non normalized sql clause
        Returns:
        a normalized SQL clause string
